experience.title: CTO & founder
experience.description:
Building Asteras.ai, an AI systems company focused on developing intelligent automation infrastructure for real-world operations.
We design and deploy custom AI platforms that integrate directly with existing business systems to enhance visibility, automate decision flows, and optimize performance across complex operations.

Our work includes:
‚Ä¢ Architecting secure, modular AI backends and automation pipelines from scratch for enterprise environments.
‚Ä¢ Developing multi-agent systems capable of analyzing data, identifying inefficiencies, and executing improvements autonomously.
‚Ä¢ Delivering end-to-end infrastructure setups, from data ingestion and monitoring to deployment and integration.
‚Ä¢ Partnering with clients to transform insights into scalable, measurable business outcomes.

We‚Äôre building towards a long-term vision of a unified AI platform that connects real-world operations with intelligent decision-making ‚Äî enabling companies to move faster, smarter, and more autonomously.

experience.title: R&D Blockchain Engineer
experience.description: Working on decentralized Web3 applications focusing on self-sovereign identities (SSI), decentralized identifiers (DID), and verifiable credentials (VC). Gained hands-on experience with Web3 protocols, blockchain-based authentication, cryptographic identity management, and secure communication flows.

experience.title: Frontend Web Developer
experience.description: Designed and implemented user interfaces using Vue.js and TypeScript. Integrated frontend with backend APIs, optimized UI performance, and participated in project planning to improve user experience.

experience.title: Independent Entrepreneur ‚Äî E-commerce & Digital Projects
experience.description:
Launched and managed multiple online ventures, including e-commerce stores and digital music distribution. Built, tested, and scaled several business models ‚Äî some gained real traction and generated consistent revenue.

Focused on:
‚Ä¢ Building and running Shopify & WooCommerce stores end-to-end.
‚Ä¢ Managing digital distribution and content monetization across streaming platforms.
‚Ä¢ Executing marketing campaigns and optimizing conversion performance.
‚Ä¢ Handling operations, suppliers, and automation workflows to improve margins.
‚Ä¢ Rapidly validating ideas and scaling what worked.

Gained strong hands-on experience in growth, execution, and product-market fit ‚Äî turning ideas into functioning digital businesses.

experience.title: E-commerce Web Developer & Technical Assistant
experience.description:
I specialized in developing e-commerce solutions that streamlined online sales processes and improved customer engagement.  

‚Ä¢ Maintained and enhanced e-commerce stores, including dropshipping and print-on-demand integrations.  
‚Ä¢ Designed and implemented membership portals and landing pages to boost user experience.  
‚Ä¢ Set up technical frameworks for blogs and social media, driving traffic and sales.
